name: EPISODE_ALL
description: This table contains all episode records, regardless of the type and is intended for use with Organization Filter functionality. If used for Organization Filtering, users will be able to see an episode if they have authorization for the owning business segment on the episode or the patient associated with the episode.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the episode record.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of the episode record. An episode status might be Active, Resolved, or Deleted.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The date the episode was initiated.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The date the episode was resolved.

columns.name: CARE_INTG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the care plan linked to the episode.
